plot: The handsome young soccer genius named Aoyama is a Japan representative. His play style is "cleanliness." He doesn't tackle and doesn't head the ball. If he's doing a throw-in, he'll only do it if he's wearing gloves. (from manga)
ending_theme: "Taiyō ga Kureta Kisetsu" (The Season the Sun Gave Us) by Fujimi High School Soccer Team
insert_song: "JUST GOAL MY WAY" by Ryotaro Okiayu (ep 9)
